recipe.title: Orzo Salad with Heirloom Tomatoes and Herbs
ingredients: 1 1/4 pounds assorted heirloom tomatoes, cut into 1/2-inch pieces
instructions: Cook orzo in large pot of boiling salted water until tender but still firm to bite, stirring occasionally. Drain. Rinse under cold water; drain well. Transfer to medium bowl; cool. Whisk vinegar and lemon juice in small bowl; gradually whisk in oil. Pour dressing over orzo. Mix in remaining ingredients. Season to taste with salt and pepper. (Can be made 2 hours ahead. Let stand at room temperature. Stir before serving.)
